articles.title: Premier League season so far: What's surprised us (Mourinho and Spurs, anyone?) and what hasn't (Man United inconsistency) - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: It's been a topsy-turvy Premier League season so far. With 10 games played, we look at the storylines that surprised and those that didn't.
articles.content:
It has been the most unpredictable of seasons, with fixture congestion, mounting injuries and the impact of COVID-19 creating unprecedented challenges for the 20 Premier League clubs.
